type: Solicitation Record issued under full public bidding. Price limit to be announced later.
short_summary: Contractors who can provide Data Science Services on issues related to criminal justice system involvement in Canada. The Request for Standing Offer (RSO) contract will involve working with client-side staff to provide data science data analysis related to criminal justice system involvement
description: to provide data science services in various domains .including data analysis related to criminal justice system involvement, providing training and IT services, and more. No geographical restrictions business area is virtual The project duration is a maximum of 30 months contract optional extensions are possible Missions included: Data preparation Data analysis Intelligence analysis Statistics Rural analytics Algorithmic system development Machine learning*New Developments*professional training Mostende/construction"},
